PeImportSection.C

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* SgAsmPEImportSection, normally named ".idata" if it appears in the section table. Most modern PE executables don't create a
00002  * special section in the section table, but rather have the SgAsmPEFileHeader::PAIR_IMPORTS RVA/Size pair point to part of the
00003  * memory mapped from another read-only section, such as the ".text" section. */
00004 #include "sage3basic.h"
00005 #include <stdarg.h>
00006 
00152 size_t SgAsmPEImportSection::mesg_nprinted = 0;
00153 
00156 bool
00157 SgAsmPEImportSection::import_mesg(const char *fmt, ...)
00158 {
00159     static const size_t max_to_print=15;
00160 
00161     bool printed=false;
00162     va_list ap;
00163     va_start(ap, fmt);
00164 
00165     if (mesg_nprinted < max_to_print) {
00166         vfprintf(stderr, fmt, ap);
00167         printed = true;
00168     } else if (mesg_nprinted == max_to_print) {
00169         fprintf(stderr, "Import message limit reached; import diagnostics are now suppressed.\n");
00170     }
00171 
00172     ++mesg_nprinted;
00173     va_end(ap);
00174     return printed;
00175 }

00177 void
00178 SgAsmPEImportSection::ctor()
00179 {
00180     set_synthesized(true);
00181 
00182     SgAsmBasicString *name = new SgAsmBasicString("PE Section Table");
00183     set_name(name);
00184     name->set_parent(this);
00185 
00186     set_purpose(SP_HEADER);
00187 
00188     p_import_directories = new SgAsmPEImportDirectoryList();
00189     p_import_directories->set_parent(this);
00190 }

00195 SgAsmPEImportSection*
00196 SgAsmPEImportSection::parse()
00197 {
00198     import_mesg_reset();
00199     SgAsmPESection::parse();
00200 
00201     SgAsmPEFileHeader *fhdr = isSgAsmPEFileHeader(get_header());
00202     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00203 
00204     ROSE_ASSERT(is_mapped());
00205     rose_addr_t idir_va = get_mapped_actual_va();
00206 
00207     /* Parse each Import Directory. The list of directories is terminated with a zero-filled entry, which is not added to this
00208      * import section. */
00209     for (size_t i = 0; 1; i++) {
00210         /* Import directory entry */
00211         SgAsmPEImportDirectory *idir = new SgAsmPEImportDirectory(this);
00212         if (NULL==idir->parse(idir_va)) {
00213             /* We've reached the zero entry. Remove this directory from the section and delete it. */
00214             remove_import_directory(idir);
00215             SageInterface::deleteAST(idir);
00216             break;
00217         }
00218         idir_va += sizeof(SgAsmPEImportDirectory::PEImportDirectory_disk);
00219 #if 1   /* FIXME: Do we really want this stuff duplicated in the AST? [RPM 2008-12-12] */
00220         SgAsmGenericString *name2 = new SgAsmBasicString(idir->get_dll_name()->get_string());
00221         fhdr->add_dll(new SgAsmGenericDLL(name2));
00222 #endif
00223     }
00224     return this;
00225 }
00226 
00228 void
00229 SgAsmPEImportSection::add_import_directory(SgAsmPEImportDirectory *d)
00230 {
00231     ROSE_ASSERT(get_import_directories()!=NULL);
00232     SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList &dirlist = get_import_directories()->get_vector();
00233 
00234     /* Make sure it's not already on the list */
00235     ROSE_ASSERT(dirlist.end()==std::find(dirlist.begin(), dirlist.end(), d));
00236 
00237     dirlist.push_back(d);
00238     get_import_directories()->set_isModified(true);
00239     d->set_parent(get_import_directories());
00240 }
00241 
00243 void
00244 SgAsmPEImportSection::remove_import_directory(SgAsmPEImportDirectory *d)
00245 {
00246     SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList &dirlist = get_import_directories()->get_vector();
00247     SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList::iterator found = std::find(dirlist.begin(), dirlist.end(), d);
00248     if (found!=dirlist.end()) {
00249         dirlist.erase(found);
00250         d->set_parent(NULL);
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00259 bool
00260 SgAsmPEImportSection::reallocate()
00261 {
00262     import_mesg_reset();
00263     bool reallocated = SgAsmPESection::reallocate();
00264     rose_rva_t end_rva(this->get_mapped_preferred_rva(), this);
00265     SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList &dirlist = get_import_directories()->get_vector();
00266 
00267     /* Space needed for the list of import directory structs. The list is terminated with a zero entry. */
00268     size_t nimports = dirlist.size();
00269     end_rva.increment((1 + nimports) * sizeof(SgAsmPEImportDirectory::PEImportDirectory_disk));
00270 
00271     /* Space needed for the data of each import directory. */
00272     for (size_t i=0; i<nimports; i++)
00273         end_rva.increment(dirlist[i]->reallocate(end_rva));
00274 
00275     /* Adjust the section size */
00276     rose_addr_t need = end_rva.get_rel();
00277     if (need < get_size()) {
00278         if (is_mapped())
00279             set_mapped_size(need);
00280         set_size(need);
00281         reallocated = true;
00282     } else if (need > get_size()) {
00283         get_file()->shift_extend(this, 0, need-get_size(), SgAsmGenericFile::ADDRSP_ALL, SgAsmGenericFile::ELASTIC_HOLE);
00284         reallocated = true;
00285     }
00286 
00287     return reallocated;
00288 }
00289 
00297 size_t
00298 SgAsmPEImportSection::reallocate_iats(rose_rva_t start_at)
00299 {
00300     rose_rva_t rva = start_at;
00301     const SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList &dirs = get_import_directories()->get_vector();
00302     for (SgAsmPEImportDirectoryPtrList::const_iterator di=dirs.begin(); di!=dirs.end(); ++di) {
00303         (*di)->set_iat_rva(rva);
00304         size_t need = (*di)->iat_required_size();
00305         (*di)->set_iat_nalloc(need);
00306         rva.increment(need);
00307     }
00308     return rva.get_rel() - start_at.get_rel();
00309 }

00312 /* Write the import section back to disk */
00313 void
00314 SgAsmPEImportSection::unparse(std::ostream &f) const
00315 {
00316     import_mesg_reset();
00317 #if 1 /* DEBUGGING [RPM 2010-11-09] */
00318     {
00319         uint8_t byte = 0;
00320         for (size_t i=0; i<get_size(); i++)
00321             write(f, i, 1, &byte);
00322     }
00323 #endif
00324 
00325     unparse_holes(f);
00326 
00327     /* Import Directory Entries and all they point to (even in other sections) */
00328     for (size_t i=0; i<get_import_directories()->get_vector().size(); i++) {
00329         SgAsmPEImportDirectory *idir = get_import_directories()->get_vector()[i];
00330         try {
00331             idir->unparse(f, this, i);
00332         } catch(const ShortWrite&) {
00333             import_mesg("SgAsmImportSection::unparse: error: Import Directory #%zu skipped (short write)\n", i);
00334         }
00335     }
00336 
00337     /* Zero terminated */
00338     SgAsmPEImportDirectory::PEImportDirectory_disk zero;
00339     memset(&zero, 0, sizeof zero);
00340     write(f, get_import_directories()->get_vector().size()*sizeof(zero), sizeof zero, &zero);
00341 }

00343 /* Print debugging info */
00344 void
00345 SgAsmPEImportSection::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00346 {
00347     char p[4096];
00348     if (idx>=0) {
00349         sprintf(p, "%sPEImportSection[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00350     } else {
00351         sprintf(p, "%sPEImportSection.", prefix);
00352     }
00353 
00354     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00355 
00356     SgAsmPESection::dump(f, p, -1);
00357     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu\n", p, w, "ndirectories", p_import_directories->get_vector().size());
00358     for (size_t i=0; i<p_import_directories->get_vector().size(); i++)
00359         p_import_directories->get_vector()[i]->dump(f, p, i);
00360 
00361     if (variantT() == V_SgAsmPEImportSection) //unless a base class
00362         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"data at ", p_data);
00363 }
